items.title: Init system
items.description: PID 1 lifecycle management and supervised service startup.

items.title: Sutra IPC
items.description: Service-to-service messaging bus and runtime communication layer.

items.title: Coreutils
items.description: Core command set for system operations and developer workflows.

items.title: Build pipeline
items.description: Image build flow for compile, packaging, and boot artifact generation.

items.title: Display protocol
items.description: Native display protocol layer for Avyos compositor and clients.

items.title: Graphics framework
items.description: Rendering and UI primitives for system graphics and app surfaces.

items.title: Display server
items.description: Compositor service handling session rendering and window composition.

items.title: System + user apps
items.description: User-facing application layer delivered with the desktop baseline.

items.title: Hardware Acceleration
items.description: Hardware accelerated graphics with vulkan

items.title: Static IPv4 Ethernet
items.description: Basic static IPv4 Ethernet setup is available for current runtime use.

items.title: Dynamic IP address with ipv6
items.description: Support for dynamic ip assign and ipv6 support

items.title: Wifi support
items.description: Support for opensource wifi hardware

items.title: Network Manager tool
items.description: Proper user, system tools and services for network management

items.title: Redesigned Web and Engine
items.description: redesigned web and engine

items.title: None
items.description: Audio stack is not implemented yet.

items.title: None
items.description: Video stack is not implemented yet.

items.title: Wayland bridge
items.description: Bridge path under QA to map Wayland clients into Avyos display flow.

items.title: Distro container
items.description: Container-based compatibility path under QA for Linux distribution workloads.

items.title: Resource reuse
items.description: Framework to reuse proprietary resources for graphics and codecs

items.title: QEMU arm64 and amd64
items.description: Primary virtualization target for arm64 (aarch64) and amd64 (x86_64) build and boot validation.

items.title: Desktop and Laptops
items.description: Proper support for generic real desktop and laptop systems.

items.title: Embedded
items.description: Support for embedded devices (primarly raspberry pi)
